mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, order_id, user_id, good_id, address_id, pay_id, create_at, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, order_id, user_id, good_id, address_id, pay_id, create_at, status from orders
SELECT id, order_id, user_id, good_id, address_id, pay_id, create_at, status FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT o.id, o.order_id, o.user_id, o.good_id, o.address_id, o.pay_id, o.create_at, o.status, g.price FROM orders o left join goods g on o.good_id=g.id WHERE o.good_id = #{goodId}
SELECT SUM(g.price) as spend FROM orders o LEFT JOIN goods g ON o.good_id = g.id group by o.user_id having o.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT SUM(g.price) as income FROM orders o LEFT JOIN goods g
ON o.good_id = g.id
group by g.user_id
HAVING g.user_id = #{userId}
